alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 06 at 1:59AM MST until November 06 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains...including Highway 40 over Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times due to icy and snowpacked roads and significantly reduced visibility in areas of snow and blowing snow. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
